short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove third-party and sponsored content advertisements from Kijiji.ca

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes annoying ads and content from Kijiji.ca. No longer will you see results from Wayfair or other sponsored sites when search results run out.

Note: If you have created and purchased a feature ad, you may not see your ad in search results when this extension is enabled.This extension works very simply and removes elements on the webpage based on class name. 

The code is fully open source, available here: https://github.com/snacsnoc/kifixer
